languages.text: "Или он огромен, как Солнечный волк, что каждое утро выходит на охоту и озаряет наш мир светом? Всеотец — не бог, а образец человека. Обычным людям тяжело осознать это, но мы, его воители и потомки, помним правду".

"Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."
languages.original_text: "Или он огромен, как Солнечный волк, что каждое утро выходит на охоту и озаряет наш мир светом? Всеотец — не бог, а образец человека. Обычным людям тяжело осознать это, но мы, его воители и потомки, помним правду".

traits.locale_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the first among humans. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the first among humans. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the first among humans. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “还是说，他像日狼一样巨大，每天早上都会起来狩猎，让我们的世界充满光明？全父并不是神，而是人类最光辉的模范。普通人很难接受这样的真相，但我们是他的战士，是他的后代，我们始终铭记这个事实。”
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: “还是说，他像日狼一样巨大，每天早上都会起来狩猎，让我们的世界充满光明？全父并不是神，而是最强大的人类。普通人很难接受这样的真相，但我们是他的战士，是他的后代，我们始终铭记这个事实。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿O acaso es tan enorme como el Lobo Solar, que emprende la caza cada mañana y llena de luz el mundo? El Padre de todas las cosas no es un dios, sino el mayor entre los humanos. A los humanos normales les cuesta entenderlo, pero nosotros, sus guerreros y descendientes, recordamos la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: «¿O acaso es tan enorme como el Lobo Solar, que emprende la caza cada mañana y llena de luz el mundo? El Padre de todas las cosas no es un dios, sino el primero entre los humanos. A los humanos normales les cuesta entenderlo, pero nosotros, sus guerreros y descendientes, recordamos la verdad».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「それとも、毎朝狩りのために昇り、この世界を光で満たすサンウルフのように巨大な存在なのだろうか？全知の父は神ではなく、人類最高の存在だ。普通の人間はこのことを理解するのに苦労するが、彼の戦士であり末裔である我々は真実を忘れない」
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「それとも、毎朝狩りのために昇り、この世界を光で満たすサンウルフのように巨大な存在なのだろうか？全知の父は神ではなく、人類最高の存在だ。普通の人間はこのことを理解するのに苦労するが、彼の戦士であり末裔である我々は真実を忘れない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Oder ist er so enorm wie der Sonnenwolf, der sich jeden Morgen zur Jagd erhebt und unsere Welt mit Licht erfüllt? Der Allvater ist kein Gott, sondern der Höchste der Menschheit. Gewöhnliche Menschen haben Mühe, das zu begreifen, doch wir, seine Krieger und seine Nachfahren, erinnern uns an die Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Oder ist er so enorm wie der Sonnenwolf, der sich jeden Morgen zur Jagd erhebt und unsere Welt mit Licht erfüllt? Der Allvater ist kein Gott, sondern der Erste unter den Menschen. Gewöhnliche Menschen haben Mühe, das zu begreifen, doch wir, seine Krieger und seine Nachfahren, erinnern uns an die Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ou est-il aussi gigantesque que le Loup du Soleil, qui part à la chasse chaque matin et illumine notre monde de sa lumière ? Le Père de Tous n'est pas un dieu, mais le meilleur des humains. Les humains ordinaires ont du mal à le comprendre, mais nous, ses guerriers et ses rejetons, nous nous souvenons de la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Ou est-il aussi gigantesque que le Loup du Soleil, qui part à la chasse chaque matin et illumine notre monde de sa lumière ? Le Père de Tous n'est pas un dieu, juste le meilleur des humains. Les humains ordinaires ont du mal à le comprendre, mais nous, ses guerriers et ses rejetons, nous nous souvenons de la vérité. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

languages.text: "Yoksa her sabah avlanmak için uyanan ve dünyamızı ışıkla dolduran Güneş Kurdu gibi muazzam mıdır? Yücebaba, tanrı değildir. İnsanlığın en yücesidir. Sıradan insanlar bunu anlayamazlar ama onun savaşçıları ve evlatları olarak biz, hakikati unutmayız."
languages.original_text: "Or is he as enormous as the Sun Wolf, which rises to hunt every morning and fills our world with light? The Allfather is not a god, but the highest of Humanity. Ordinary humans struggle to grasp this, but we, his warriors and offspring, remember the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Yoksa her sabah avlanmak için uyanan ve dünyamızı ışıkla dolduran Güneş Kurdu gibi muazzam mıdır? Yücebaba tanrı değildir. İnsanlığın en yücesidir. Sıradan insanlar bunu anlayamazlar ama onun savaşçıları ve evlatları olarak biz, hakikati unutmayız."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
